name: ErlebnisSennerei Zillertal
description:
Experience the natural cycles of high quality food with all your senses!
The Show Farm will allow visitors to see the first and most important stage in the development of our high quality produce: animals living in an appropriate environment.
It is about raising awareness on where our food comes from, and how we treat our animals as well as the understanding of the significance of its origins:
hay milk from cow, sheep and goat
organic hens
our buzzy honey-makers, the bee
Mini-tractor and (play) facillities for the young visitors
Open to visitors as of June 2015
Information regarding opening times can be obtained through the

below mentioned contact details.
Best time to visit is all year around.
Groups are welcome with advance booking.
It is ideal for children.
